user_query: I'm organizing a company picnic and I want to ensure the food options cater to different dietary needs. Can you provide the nutritional analysis for the proposed menu items? Additionally, I would like some guidelines for organizing a successful company picnic.

TaskList.description: Collect the proposed menu items for the picnic.
Analyze the nutritional content of the proposed menu items.
Provide nutritional analysis results, identifying options suitable for various dietary needs.
Gather guidelines and best practices for organizing a successful picnic.
Compile the nutritional analysis and the guidelines into a final report for the picnic.
